description: Performs a single Create, Read, Update, or Delete operation on a target level within the PLEXOS hierarchy (Category, Object, Membership, or Property).

initial_context.user_input: Create a Geothermal category in the Generator class.

static_context_strings.default_llm_context: You are an expert in PLEXOS modeling. You are executing a direct data modification request from the user.
